body:
Jack,

Excellent! Thank you. I am surprised that -ar has any effect when sampling
is turned off (-aa 0). I didn't even try to modify -ar because I didn't
think it would do anything.

Mark

On Fri, 15 Mar 2013, Jack de Valpine wrote:
replyTo: Subject: [Radiance-general] Strange halo artifact in rendering
subject: [Radiance-general] Strange halo artifact in rendering
